1057040869.description: Defines if the entity ticks the world and the radius around it to tick.

distance_to_players.description: The distance at which the closest player has to be before this entity despawns. This option will be ignored if never_despawn is true.

never_despawn.description: If true, this entity will not despawn even if players are far away. If false, distance_to_players will be used to determine when to despawn.

radius.description: The area around the entity to tick.

1057040869.title: minecraft:tick_world

1088251937.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

items.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

AND.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

NOT.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

OR.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

all.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

all_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

any.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

1088251937.title: Filter Group

1143284943.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

max_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target.

min_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target.

speed_multiplier.description: Modifies the entity's speed when charging toward the target.

success_rate.description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%).

1143284943.title: minecraft:behavior.charge_attack

filters.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

1492465940.description: Allows this entity to use a flame-breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

cooldown_time.description: Time (in seconds) between each start of the cycle to roar, then breath flame.

flame_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

ground_flame_count.description: Number of ground flame-breath attacks to use before flight-takeoff.

roar_time.description: Time (in seconds) to roar, before breathing flame.

1492465940.title: minecraft:behavior.dragonflaming

1861715976.description: A behavior that enables a mob to transport items from and to containers.

allow_simultaneous_interaction.description: When true the mob will wait until a container is not used by other entities before starting to interact with it.

allowed_items.description: A list of item descriptors that are the only items the mob is allowed to transport. If this and "disallowed_items" are both empty, then all items are allowed. If non-empty "disallowed_items" must be empty.

destination_container_types.description: A list of block descriptors that should be a container type to put items in.

disallowed_items.description: A list of item descriptors that are the mob is not allowed to transport. If non-empty "allowed_items" must be empty.

idle_cooldown.description: When the mob cannot find a container in which to get or put items, the goal will stop being active for this amount of time in seconds.

initial_cooldown.description: How long the mob will wait after spawning or getting the goal added before the goal can start.

interaction_time.description: The amount of time in seconds spent interacting with the containers.

max_stack_size.description: The maximum stack size that the mob will try to take from a container.

max_visited_containers.description: The maximum number of containers that the mob will try to take/place items from before going on cooldown and starting over.

place_strategy.description: The strategy to use for placing the transported item. Any - always place if there is room, With matching - place if there is a matching item in the container, With matching or empty - like With matching but will also place in empty containers
place_strategy.title: place_strategy

search_distance.description: The maximum search distance horizontally and vertically at which to find containers for taking or placing items.

search_strategy.description: The strategy to use for finding source or destination containers. The nearest valid container or a random valid container in range.
search_strategy.title: search_strategy

source_container_types.description: A list of block descriptors that should be a container type to get items from.

1861715976.title: minecraft:behavior.transport_items

1900210559.description: Enables a mob to use kinetic weaponry by intermittently charging at its target and repositioning afterward.

approach_distance.description: The distance to the target within which the mob begins using its kinetic weapon.

attack_once.description: Allows the mob to perform this melee attack behavior only once during its lifetime.

can_spread_on_fire.description: Allows the mob, if on fire and empty handed, to ignite its target upon a successful attack.

cooldown_distance.description: The distance the mob retreats to after all of the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component's "max_duration" values have elapsed. After reaching this position and once "cooldown" has elapsed, the mob will approach again. This value is added to the reach midpoint.

cooldown_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed while on cooldown.

cooldown_time.description: Cooldown time, in seconds, between consecutive attacks.

hijack_mount_navigation.description: Allows the mob to override its mount's navigation behavior with the logic defined by this goal. Requires the mount to be running the "minecraft:behavior.mount_pathing" goal, which default behavior will be ignored.

inner_boundary_time_increase.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the target is beyond "path_inner_boundary".

max_path_time.description: Maximum base time, in seconds, before recalculating a new attack path to the target (before increases are applied).

melee_fov.description: Field of view, in degrees, used by the hard-coded sensing component to detect a valid attack target.

min_path_time.description: Minimum base time, in seconds, before recalculating a new attack path to the target (before increases are applied).

outer_boundary_time_increase.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the target is beyond "path_outer_boundary".

path_fail_time_increase.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the mob cannot move along the current path.

path_inner_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_time_increase".

path_outer_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_time_increase".

random_stop_interval.description: Defines a 1-in-N chance for the mob to stop its current attack, where N equals "random_stop_interval".

reposition_distance.description: The distance the mob retreats to once the target is closer than the midpoint of the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component's minimum and maximum "reach". After reaching this position, the mob will charge again. This value is added to the reach midpoint.

reposition_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed while repositioning.

require_complete_path.description: Specifies whether a full navigation path from the mob to the target is required.

speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed when moving toward its target.

track_target.description: Allows the mob to track its target even if it lacks a hard-coded sensing component.

weapon_min_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to each "min_speed" and "min_relative_speed" condition in the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component.

weapon_reach_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component's "reach".

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation, in degrees, on the X-axis while the mob is trying to look at its target.

y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation, in degrees, on the Y-axis while the mob is trying to look at its target.

1900210559.title: minecraft:behavior.use_kinetic_weapon

1926664697.description: Allows the entity to be controlled by a player which is holding the item specified in "minecraft:item_controllable" component's "control_items" field (required). Also requires the "minecraft:movement" component, and the "minecraft:rideable" component. On every tick, the entity will attempt to rotate towards where the player is facing with the control item whilst simultaneously moving forward.

fractional_rotation.description: The entity will attempt to rotate to face where the player is facing each tick. The entity will target this percentage of their difference in their current facing angles each tick (from 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 = 100%). This is limited by "fractional_rotation_limit". A value of 0.0 will result in the entity no longer turning to where the player is facing.

fractional_rotation_limit.description: Limits the total degrees the entity can rotate to face where the player is facing on each tick.

mount_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier of mount when controlled by player.

1926664697.title: minecraft:behavior.controlled_by_player

1949055570.description: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within "sniffing_radius" and update its "minecraft:suspect_tracking" component state

cooldown_range.description: Cooldown range between sniffs in seconds

suspicion_radius_horizontal.description: Mob suspicion horizontal radius. When a player is within this radius horizontally, the anger level towards that player is increased

suspicion_radius_vertical.description: Mob suspicion vertical radius. When a player is within this radius vertically, the anger level towards that player is increased

1949055570.title: minecraft:behavior.sniff

1979855054.description: Allows an entity to attack using swoop attack behavior; Ideal for use with flying mobs. The behavior ends if the entity has a horizontal collision or gets hit.

damage_reach.description: Added to the base size of the entity, to determine the target's maximum allowable distance, when trying to deal attack damage.

delay_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (in seconds) between each attempted swoop attack.

speed_multiplier.description: During swoop attack behavior, this determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving toward the target.

1979855054.title: minecraft:behavior.swoop_attack

2159667979.description: Allows the entity to eat a specified Mob.

eat_animation_time.description: Sets the time in seconds the eat animation should play for.

eat_mob_sound.description: Sets the sound that should play when eating a mob.

loot_table.description: The loot table for loot to be dropped when eating a mob.

pull_in_force.description: Sets the force which the mob-to-be-eaten is pulled towards the eating mob.

reach_mob_distance.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before eating the mob.

run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target.

2159667979.title: minecraft:behavior.eat_mob

2291122496.description: Allows the mob to try to move to air once it is close to running out of its total breathable supply. Requires "minecraft:breathable".

material_type.description: The material the mob is traveling in. An air block will only be considered valid to move to with a block of this material below it. Options are: "water", "lava", or "any".

search_height.description: The height (in blocks) above the mob's current position that it will search for a valid air block to move to. If a valid block cannot be found, the mob will move to the position this many blocks above it.

search_radius.description: The radius (in blocks) around the mob's current position that it will search for a valid air block to move to.

speed_mod.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this Goal.

2291122496.title: minecraft:behavior.swim_up_for_breath

2309924397.description: Allows this entity to perform a 'sonic boom' ranged attack

attack_cooldown.description: Cooldown in seconds required after using this attack until the entity can use sonic boom again.

attack_damage.description: Attack damage of the sonic boom.

attack_range_horizontal.description: Horizontal range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target.

attack_range_vertical.description: Vertical range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target.

charge_sound.description: Sound event for the charge up.

duration_until_attack_sound.description: Duration in seconds until the attack sound is played.

knockback_height_cap.description: Height cap of the attack knockback's vertical delta.

knockback_horizontal_strength.description: Horizontal strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target.

knockback_vertical_strength.description: Vertical strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

2309924397.title: minecraft:behavior.sonic_boom

2379072710.description: Allows the mob to drink milk based on specified environment conditions.

cooldown_seconds.description: Time (in seconds) that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

filters.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

2379072710.title: minecraft:behavior.drink_milk

2567691908.description: Allow slimes to float in water / lava. Can only be used by Slime and Magma Cubes.

jump_chance_percentage.description: Percent chance a slime or magma cube has to jump while in water / lava.

speed_multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving through water / lava.

2567691908.title: minecraft:behavior.slime_float

2628131938.description: Allows the entity to continuously jump around like a slime.

speed_multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when jumping around.

2628131938.title: minecraft:behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping

oneOf.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that a valid block name or expression is provided, and in the latter case verify that there are no block states as well
Check that a valid block name or expression is provided, and in the latter case verify that there are no block states as well

298010374.description: The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

listen_time.description: Sets the time an entity should stay near a noteblock after hearing it.

speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when moving toward the block.

start_distance.description: Sets the distance the entity needs to be away from the block to attempt to start the goal.

stop_distance.description: Sets the distance from the block the entity will attempt to reach.

298010374.title: minecraft:behavior.stay_near_noteblock

3273917994.description: Allows the entity to move in random directions like a slime.

add_random_time_range.description: Additional time (in whole seconds), chosen randomly in the range of [0, "add_random_time_range"], to add to "min_change_direction_time".

min_change_direction_time.description: Constant minimum time (in seconds) to wait before choosing a new direction.

turn_range.description: Maximum rotation angle range (in degrees) when randomly choosing a new direction.

3273917994.title: minecraft:behavior.slime_random_direction

3326653763.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks.

avoid_block_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding a block.
avoid_block_sound.title: LevelSoundEvent

search_height.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in y.

search_range.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in xz.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

sprint_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

target_blocks.description: List of block types this mob avoids.

walk_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

3326653763.title: minecraft:behavior.avoid_block

3425495100.description: Allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

avoid_mob_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding another mob.
avoid_mob_sound.title: LevelSoundEvent

avoid_target_xz.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this XZ Distance.

avoid_target_y.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this Y Distance.

entity_types.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to avoid.

ignore_visibility.description: Whether or not to ignore direct line of sight while this entity is running away from other specified entities.

max_dist.description: Maximum distance to look for an avoid target for the entity.

max_flee.description: How many blocks away from its avoid target the entity must be for it to stop fleeing from the avoid target.

on_escape_event.description: Event that is triggered when escaping from a mob.

probability_per_strength.description: Percent chance this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength, where 1.0 = 100%.

remove_target.description: Determine if we should remove target when fleeing or not.

river_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for speed when following river. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the speed faster.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

sprint_distance.description: How many blocks within range of its avoid target the entity must be for it to begin sprinting away from the avoid target.

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

3425495100.title: minecraft:behavior.avoid_mob_type

3731384245.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier applied to the mob when using this AI Goal.

3731384245.title: minecraft:behavior.breed

3786002008.description: Allows the entity go idle, if swimming. Entity must be in water.

idle_time.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to stay idle.

success_rate.description: Percent chance this entity will go idle, 1.0 = 100%.

3786002008.title: minecraft:behavior.swim_idle

3872898814.description: Allows this entity to roar at another entity based on data in minecraft:anger_level. Once the anger threshold specified in minecraft:anger_level has been reached, this entity will roar for the specified amount of time, look at the other entity, apply anger boost towards it, and finally target it.

duration.description: The amount of time to roar for.

3872898814.title: minecraft:behavior.roar

domain.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

subject.description: The subject of this filter test.

test.description: The name of the test to apply.

value.description: The value being compared with the test.

4231633335.description: Causes an entity to circle around an anchor point placed near a point or target.

angle_change.description: Number of degrees to change this entity's facing by, when the entity selects its next anchor point.

goal_radius.description: Maximum distance from the anchor-point in which this entity considers itself to have reached the anchor point. This is to prevent the entity from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

height_above_target_range.description: The number of blocks above the target that the next anchor point can be set. This value is used only when the entity is tracking a target.
height_above_target_range.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that the limits imposed on the range (minimum, maximum and maximum distance between values) are respected

height_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase or decrease the current height around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. "height_change_chance" is deprecated and has been replaced with "height_adjustment_chance".

height_offset_range.description: Vertical distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within, upon a successful height adjustment.

radius_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase the size of the current movement radius around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. "radius_change_chance" is deprecated and has been replaced with "radius_adjustment_chance".

radius_change.description: The number of blocks to increase the current movement radius by, upon successful "radius_adjustment_chance". If the current radius increases over the range maximum, the current radius will be set back to the range minimum and the entity will change between clockwise and counter-clockwise movement.

radius_range.description: Horizontal distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within upon a successful radius adjustment.
radius_range.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that the limits imposed on the range (minimum, maximum and maximum distance between values) are respected

speed_multiplier.description: Multiplies the speed at which this entity travels to its next desired position.

4231633335.title: minecraft:behavior.circle_around_anchor

541278563.description: Enables an aquatic mob to dash at its target with knockback; includes overshoot and cooldown settings.

attack_reach.description: Horizontal reach grown around the mob's AABB to register a hit.

charge_cooldown_time.description: Range of time in seconds to wait before starting another charge.
charge_cooldown_time.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that the limits imposed on the range (minimum, maximum and maximum distance between values) are respected

charge_overshoot_distance.description: Distance beyond the target the mob aims during a charge.

charge_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier applied during the charge.

knockback_force.description: Knockback force applied to the target on hit.

max_charge_distance.description: Maximum distance at which the mob attempts a charge.

541278563.title: minecraft:behavior.aquatic_charge_attack

597030358.description: Causes the entity to grow tired every once in a while, while attacking.

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

speed_multiplier.description: During attack behavior, this multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving toward the target.

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

597030358.title: minecraft:behavior.slime_attack

61802587.description: Allows the entity to wander around while swimming, when not path-finding.

interval.description: Percent chance to start wandering, when not path-finding. 1 = 100%

look_ahead.description: Distance to look ahead for obstacle avoidance, while wandering.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when wandering.

wander_time.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to wander after wandering behavior was successfully started.

61802587.title: minecraft:behavior.swim_wander

check_if_outnumbered.description: If true, the mob will check if its outnumbered

cooldown.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

filters.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

max_flee.description: Maximum distance this mob can be from the target to stop fleeing

max_height.description: Maximum height this mob can be away to be a valid choice

must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

reevaluate_description.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the sprinting speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

911233651.description: Allows this entity to dig into the ground before despawning.

allow_dig_when_named.description: If true, this behavior can run when this entity is named. Otherwise not.

digs_in_daylight.description: Indicates that the actor should start digging when it sees daylight

idle_time.description: The minimum idle time in seconds between the last detected disturbance to the start of digging.

on_start.description: Event(s) to run when the goal starts.

suspicion_is_disturbance.description: If true, finding new suspicious locations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

vibration_is_disturbance.description: If true, vibrations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

911233651.title: minecraft:behavior.dig

on_bred.description: A Molang expression defining the amount of experience rewarded when this entity is successfully bred.

on_death.description: A Molang expression defining the amount of experience rewarded when this entity dies.

minecraft:behavior.aquatic_charge_attack.description: Enables an aquatic mob to dash at its target with knockback; includes overshoot and cooldown settings.

minecraft:behavior.avoid_block.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks.

minecraft:behavior.avoid_mob_type.description: Allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

minecraft:behavior.breed.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

minecraft:behavior.charge_attack.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

minecraft:behavior.circle_around_anchor.description: Causes an entity to circle around an anchor point placed near a point or target.

minecraft:behavior.controlled_by_player.description: Allows the entity to be controlled by a player which is holding the item specified in "minecraft:item_controllable" component's "control_items" field (required). Also requires the "minecraft:movement" component, and the "minecraft:rideable" component. On every tick, the entity will attempt to rotate towards where the player is facing with the control item whilst simultaneously moving forward.

minecraft:behavior.dig.description: Allows this entity to dig into the ground before despawning.

minecraft:behavior.dragonflaming.description: Allows this entity to use a flame-breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

minecraft:behavior.drink_milk.description: Allows the mob to drink milk based on specified environment conditions.

minecraft:behavior.eat_mob.description: Allows the entity to eat a specified Mob.

minecraft:behavior.roar.description: Allows this entity to roar at another entity based on data in minecraft:anger_level. Once the anger threshold specified in minecraft:anger_level has been reached, this entity will roar for the specified amount of time, look at the other entity, apply anger boost towards it, and finally target it.

minecraft:behavior.slime_attack.description: Causes the entity to grow tired every once in a while, while attacking.

minecraft:behavior.slime_float.description: Allow slimes to float in water / lava. Can only be used by Slime and Magma Cubes.

minecraft:behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping.description: Allows the entity to continuously jump around like a slime.

minecraft:behavior.slime_random_directio.description: Allows the entity to move in random directions like a slime.

minecraft:behavior.sniff.description: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within "sniffing_radius" and update its "minecraft:suspect_tracking" component state

minecraft:behavior.sonic_boom.description: Allows this entity to perform a 'sonic boom' ranged attack

minecraft:behavior.stay_near_noteblock.description: The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

minecraft:behavior.swim_idle.description: Allows the entity go idle, if swimming. Entity must be in water.

minecraft:behavior.swim_up_for_breath.description: Allows the mob to try to move to air once it is close to running out of its total breathable supply. Requires "minecraft:breathable".

minecraft:behavior.swim_wander.description: Allows the entity to wander around while swimming, when not path-finding.

minecraft:behavior.swoop_attack.description: Allows an entity to attack using swoop attack behavior; Ideal for use with flying mobs. The behavior ends if the entity has a horizontal collision or gets hit.

minecraft:behavior.transport_items.description: A behavior that enables a mob to transport items from and to containers.

minecraft:behavior.use_kinetic_weapon.description: Enables a mob to use kinetic weaponry by intermittently charging at its target and repositioning afterward.

minecraft:tick_world.description: Defines if the entity ticks the world and the radius around it to tick.
